content.query:
use logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go

if OBJECT_id('silver.trip_type') is not null 
    drop EXTERNAL table silver.trip_type go


create EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_type
    with(
        location = 'silver_layer/trip_type' ,
        DATA_SOURCE = logical_DWH_exDS,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquert_file
    )as 

select * from bronze.trip_type go

select * from silver.trip_type go
